headline: 3 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: American Express, Chubb, and VeriSign all look like stable long-term investments.

headline: Here's the 1 Stock Warren Buffett Bought in 2024 He's Most Likely to Buy Again This Quarter
summary: It's no secret that Warren Buffett isn't finding many stocks he likes enough to buy these days.  Which stock did Buffett buy in 2024 that he's most likely to buy again this quarter?  The most notable addition to Berkshire Hathaway's portfolio in the first quarter of 2024 was Chubb (NYSE: CB).
